name: Eph3m
description: This project is a personal exercise to experiment with and improve my skills in React and Tailwind by simulating a fashion-related e-commerce.
infos: Eph3m was born from the idea of merging a futuristic UX with glitch and dystopian elements.

name: Fraisette
description: A personal project simulating a small online bakery shop, created as an exercise to improve my skills with React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS.
infos: This project draws inspiration from colorful and sweet-themed websites, aiming to recreate a lively and welcoming experience, like an online bakery selling snacks and homemade pastries.

name: Level Design
description: A collection of speed level designs created over the years.
